instruction: Design a visual representation of the data given below.
input: The number of public transport users in New York increased by 24% in 2019 compared to 2018.
output: A bar graph can be used to visually represent this data. The x-axis will represent the year (2018 and 2019), while the y-axis will represent the number of public transport users. The bars will be labeled with the year and it will show an increase of 24% for 2019 compared to 2018.
